channel.title: Stanley Cup Finals
channel.description:
So since Game 7 is tonight who do you guys think is going to win the cup? Vancouver or Boston?
Personally since I was born in Vancouver I'm cheering for them. I would love to hear what everyone else thinks.

item.title: Stanley Cup Finals
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

[quote=“MawV3, post:3, topic:399435”]Well vancouver also lost Mayson Raymond in the last game when he went into the boards backwards. He broke a vertebrae in his back.

here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qn97tELtNTI

They say he’s out until november.[/quote]

I didn’t really see it, was it dity? And who did it?

EDIT

[size=36pt]BRUINS WON![/size]

Read full topic

item.title: Stanley Cup Finals
item.dc:creator: @MawV3 MawV3
item.description:
@MawV3 wrote:

Well vancouver also lost Mayson Raymond in the last game when he went into the boards backwards. He broke a vertebrae in his back.

here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qn97tELtNTI

They say he’s out until november.

item.title: Stanley Cup Finals
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

YES! I live right next to Boston dude, I’m going to party at my friend’s house all night. I’m a Boston fan, but in my opinion I think

Boston is going to lose because they’re away. I also think Vancouver dives a little bit, especially Burrows. -.- Personally Lapierre

disgusts me. Whoever wins it wins it, it’s a huge accomplishment just to be there. Bruins <3

Read full topic
